definition: variant of 靡費|靡费[mi2 fei4]

sentences.english: Meanwhile, is also a huge waste of resources.
sentences.chinese: 同時，也是一種宏大地資本糜費。

sentences.english: We must not waste the precious gift of this time.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能糜費當前珍貴的機遇。

sentences.english: I don't like chatting online, cause that's a waste of time.
sentences.chinese: 本人不喜好網上聊天，由於糜費時間。

sentences.english: Too many students waste time on TV.
sentences.chinese: 太多學生把時間糜費在看電視。

sentences.english: It's a sin to waste food.
Problem can be avoided in the first time a waste of time and money.
sentences.chinese: 在第一時間解決問題能夠防止糜費時間和金錢。
